item.title: Simulation installation
item.description: If you want to try movements on the robot without using the real robot, you can install a simulated Reachy 2 on your computer, and run it the same way the real robot is run. Clone the sources of our docker, and pull the sources: git clone git@github.com:pollen-robotics/docker_reachy2_core.git cd docker_reachy2_core ./pull_sources.sh beta Then download the configuration files: git clone git@github.com:pollen-robotics/reachy_config_example.git cp -r reachy_config_example/.reachy_config ~/ In your docker_reachy2_core folder, compose a container with:
